strapiPost.title: Bentonville Film Festival Announces 2023 Dates
strapiPost.content:
The Bentonville Film Festival will return for its 9th year next summer from June 13-18, 2023, in person with on-demand streaming available through June 25, and is receiving submissions staring now! 

  • Genres: The competition features film and TV in the categories of Narrative, Documentary, Shorts, and Episodic with this year including new categories for short films in Animation, and Adventure. 
  • More: The weeklong event will also feature panels that challenge industry norms, and conversations that emphasize independent artists in the art of film, storytelling and technology; and curated studio spotlight films with celebrity conversations.

Keep up with BFF on Instagram for updates HERE.
